snippet.title: PC Engine Longplay [297] Godzilla: Bakutou Retsuden
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: NPI

The Japanese version of Godzilla. Played on medium mode. You have 5 levels in which you can choose your enemies (10 in total). There are also quiz levels. And the music is much better in this version. I got to the best final boss (out of 6 you can choose at the end) and I recorded the battles of the other five bosses at 19:18 

For the other 5 levels, see the longplay named simply Godzilla (the US version). -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
